media.title: Inception
media.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology.

media.title: The Matrix
media.synopsis: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality.

media.title: Breaking Bad
media.synopsis: A chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer.

media.title: The Dark Knight
media.synopsis: Batman battles the Joker in Gotham's darkest hour.

media.title: Game of Thrones
media.synopsis: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros.

media.title: Black Panther
media.synopsis: Tâ€™Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward as king.

media.title: The Office
media.synopsis: A mockumentary sitcom about office life at Dunder Mifflin.

media.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
media.synopsis: Jake Sully and his family return to Pandora in this spectacular sequel to the groundbreaking original film.

media.title: Top Gun: Maverick
media.synopsis: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, training a new generation of pilots.

media.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
media.synopsis: Peter Parker's secret identity is revealed, forcing him to ask Doctor Strange for help, unleashing the multiverse.

media.title: Dune
media.synopsis: Paul Atreides leads nomadic tribes in a revolt against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis.

media.title: The Batman
media.synopsis: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues.

media.title: Encanto
media.synopsis: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

media.title: Wednesday
media.synopsis: Wednesday Addams' years as a student, when she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability and solve a mystery.

media.title: House of the Dragon
media.synopsis: The Targaryen civil war, set 200 years before the events of Game of Thrones.

media.title: The Bear
media.synopsis: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his deceased brother's Italian beef sandwich shop.

media.title: The Last of Us
media.synopsis: Twenty years after a fungal outbreak ravages the planet, survivors Joel and Ellie embark on a journey across America.

media.title: Euphoria
media.synopsis: A group of high school students navigate love and friendships in a world of drugs, sex, trauma and social media.

media.title: Squid Game
media.synopsis: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a billion-dollar prize.

media.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
media.synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence.

media.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
media.synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher.

media.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
media.synopsis: Doctor Strange teams up with a mysterious teenage girl who can travel across multiverses.

media.title: Peaky Blinders
media.synopsis: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps.

media.title: The Witcher
media.synopsis: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people prove more wicked than beasts.
